name: 林彥良
objective: This course aims to provide an introduction to English language teaching (ELT) approaches and language education Industries. The course equips students with the theoretical knowledge and practical skills in ELT course design, teaching materials development, and learning activities and games design. The issues associated with the development of language education Industries will also be discussed.
